alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 11:52PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Bradley, south central Cleveland, Calhoun, southeastern Dallas and central Ouachita Counties through 1115 PM CST... At 1051 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Thornton to 7 miles northwest of Highland Industrial Park to near White Oak Lake State Park. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden... Warren... Fordyce... Hampton... Bearden... Thornton... Harrell... Poison Springs State Park... Cullendale... Ellisville... Harlow... Hampton Municipal Airport... Highland Industrial Park... Weeks... Tipton... Marks Mill State Park... Lanark... East Camden... Banks... Tinsman... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.
